attributes.action: Make all fines a percentage of annual income rather than the static amounts currently used
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Other countries namely Sweden use this system which socially is by far the fairer system for the poor. £30 to a low income family is a lot but to those higher up the income ladder may become irrelevant. Therefore balance the fine such that it has the same impact all over.

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with several already in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/finesbyincome/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
